type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.diagnostics.AbstractReportTask
type.description: The base class for all project report tasks.

method.name: getOutputFile
method.description:
Returns the file which the report will be written to. When set to null, the report is written to System.out. Defaults to null.

returns:The output file. May be null.

method.name: getProjects
method.description:
Returns the set of project to generate this report for. By default, the report is generated for the task's containing project.

returns:The set of files.

method.name: setOutputFile
method.description:
Sets the file which the report will be written to. Set this to null to write the report to System.out.
param:outputFile The output file. May be null.

method.name: setProjects
method.description:
Specifies the set of projects to generate this report for.
param:projects The set of projects. Must not be null.

property.name: outputFile
property.description:
Returns the file which the report will be written to. When set to null, the report is written to System.out. Defaults to null.

returns:The output file. May be null.

property.name: projects
property.description:
Returns the set of project to generate this report for. By default, the report is generated for the task's containing project.

returns:The set of files.
